descriptions.name: Overview of class

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Examples of books may include -

Anthropology's Politics: Disciplining the Middle East, Jessica Winegar and Lara Deeb

Field Notes: The Making of Middle East Studies in the United States, Zachary Lockman

Refugees of Revolution: Experiences of Palestinian Exile, Diana Allan
